skills.skill: Wireless Communication Protocols (e.g., Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, NFC)
IT Test Tools and Techniques (e.g., Wireshark)
CVP Tester Certification or Prior FIPS Experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform security analysis, documentation authoring, source code review, and operational testing for cryptographic IT products.
Conduct presentations, workshops, and report writing related to security evaluation.
Maintain/improve technical knowledge and perform audit-related tasks as directed.
Prepare and execute source code test plans, operational test plans, and other testing activities in accordance with applicable standards and methodologies.
Consult with senior engineers on testing matters requiring clarification and develop creative solutions in a team environment.

education_certification.credential: Post-secondary program in IT security, computer science, or engineering
